short_summary: Replenishment of goods and materials for the Department of National Defence
description: Replenishment of goods and materials for the Department of National Defence.
full_summary:
### Replenishment Contract Solicitation
#### Requisition for Goods and Services
##### Contracted Goods Description
This [Request for Proposal (RFP)] is inviting companies to submit their bids for numerous items of goods and services. The following is a detailed breakdown of the requisition including the NSN and NCAGE numbers as required:
* Item 1: Shielding Materials (Corrosion Prevention)
	+ NSN: 12-3172021
	+ NCAGE: C4080 
	+ Quantity: 31 units (compressed in a protective bag)
	+ Delivery location: CFB Halifax
* Item 2: Shielding Materials (Corrosion Prevention)
	+ NSN: 12-3172021  
	+ NCAGE: C4080
	+ Quantity: 21 units (compressed in a protective bag) 
	+ Delivery location: CFB Esquimalt
* Item 3: Anode (Corrosion Prevention)
	+ NSN: 21-6600392
	+ NCAGE: 36487/ L0093
	+ Quantity: 49 units
	+ Delivery location: CFB Halifax
	+ Part number options: P7B2 (36487) and EFL-Z-47A (L0093)
* Item 4: Anode (Corrosion Prevention)
	+ NSN: 21-6600392
	+ NCAGE: 36487/ L0093
	+ Quantity: 146 units
	+ Delivery location: CFB Esquimalt
	+ Part number options: P7B2 (36487) and EFL-Z-47A (L0093)

Upon receipt of the bid, potential suppliers will need to provide a justification for their products. Additionally, all bids must be submitted in Canadian dollars. No exchange rate fluctuation risk mitigation provisions will be accepted.
#### Relevant Notice and Contact Information
This RFP is hosted through the Government of Canada’s [Buyandsell.gc.ca](http://Buyandsell.gc.ca) website. Documents may be filed in either of Canada’s two official languages (English, French).
 
_Contact Person:_ Johan Vizcaya Collado
_E-mail:_ [johan.vizcayacollado@forces.gc.ca](mailto:johan.vizcayacollado@forces.gc.ca)
_Phone:_ (999) 999-9999
_Address:_ 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa
